comments.en:
For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

Large-format inkjet printer.

600 dpi in grayscale, only 300 dpi in color.

Works "almost" - RGB data are sent to the plotter. The CMYK mode of the "B"-Models and the 75x Series is not supported. Images are somewhat "greenish"; gray is composed of CMY. Nice for really LARGE printouts ... (ISO A0).
